While raido is right that you can try it if you so please, Naird's point is pretty spot on. The main story is at odds with event stories in the game and varies wildly ib quality not to mention that while, yes it can be played f2p everyone stays for the characters and like any gacha game it can fuck with you unless you spend tons or are very lucky. Ultimately it's a time sink like other most mobiles so logically it isn't worth it.

indeed gbf is very grindy and its more bearable if you have friends in it tbh. that being said, i have no friends whatsoever. 
this doujin tho, its good,
